text:
[redacted_name]1982 9TH ST PL SE
[redacted_name] NC 28602
日期：2024 年 10 月 10 日案 ID：[redacted_number]
我們是為社會安全管理局做出殘疾決定的辦公室。 我們必須在 2024 年 10 月 20 日之前與您交談，這一點非常重要。
如有需要，請致電授權安排對索賠人的傷殘索賠進行評估。 該檢查將在當地免費進行，並由社會安全安排。 如果需要的話，體檢必須親自進行。 任何特殊測試也需要親自進行。
trans:
[redacted_name]1982 9TH ST PL SE
[redacted_name] NC 28602
Date: October 10, 2024 Case ID: [redacted_number]
We are the office making disability determinations for the Social Security Administration. It is very important that we speak with you before October 20, 2024.
If necessary, please call to arrange authorization for an evaluation of the claimant's disability claim. The examination will be conducted locally at no cost and arranged by Social Security. If required, the physical examination must be conducted in person. Any special tests must also be conducted in person.
